name: In re ESTATE of Joseph BECKS. Appeal of Isabel YESKO and Katherine Markosich

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Joseph BECKS. Appeal of Isabel YESKO and Katherine Markosich.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: J. D. Talarico, Pittsburgh, Charles S. Hersh, Sharon, for appellant at No. 6.
J. D. Talarico, Pittsburgh, John J. Regule, Sharon, for appellant at No. 7.
P. Raymond Batholomew, Sharon, for appellee at No. 6 and No. 7.
casebody.head_matter:
356 A.2d 360
In re ESTATE of Joseph BECKS. Appeal of Isabel YESKO and Katherine Markosich.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 12, 1976.
Decided May 12, 1976.
J. D. Talarico, Pittsburgh, Charles S. Hersh, Sharon, for appellant at No. 6.
J. D. Talarico, Pittsburgh, John J. Regule, Sharon, for appellant at No. 7.
P. Raymond Batholomew, Sharon, for appellee at No. 6 and No. 7.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
